LanguageData.AC.InstallStackDesc: Select a pawn or empty sleeve to implant the persona stack in via surgery. The surgery will automatically be created in the health tab of the selected pawn or sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.InstallEmptyStackDesc: Select a pawn to implant the empty persona stack in via surgery. The surgery will automatically be created in the health tab of the selected pawn or sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.InstallArchotechStackDesc: Select a pawn or empty sleeve to implant the archotech stack in via surgery. The surgery will automatically be created in the health tab of the selected pawn or sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.InstallEmptyArchotechStackDesc: Select a pawn to implant the empty archotech stack in via surgery. The surgery will automatically be created in the health tab of the selected pawn or sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.DesignatorExtractStackDesc: Extract persona stacks from dead bodies
LanguageData.AC.MessageMustDesignateHasStack: The body should have a persona stack
LanguageData.AC.DestroyedStackDesc: An empty stack was destroyed by inept actions of {PAWN_labelShort}.
LanguageData.AC.DestroyedWipingStackDesc: A stack was destroyed by inept actions of {PAWN_labelShort}.
LanguageData.AC.EmptyStackConfirmation: Deleting Stack:\nWARNING! You are about to wipe this stack, killing the person saved on it. Are you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.AC.DestroyStackConfirmation: Destroying Stack:\nWARNING! You are about to destroy this stack. Are you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.AC.CantWipeStackTooDumb: Rest Stack (requires intellectual skill of 5 or higher)
LanguageData.AC.FailedPersonaStackDestroyed: Decrypt Ancient Stacks: Failed, persona stack destroyed!
LanguageData.AC.ScenPart_PawnsHavePersonaStack: {0} have a {1} chance of starting with a {2}.
LanguageData.AC.AutoLoadDesc: If active, haulers will automatically store this persona print in a persona matrix.
LanguageData.AC.PawnAlreadyHasStack: {PAWN_nameDef} already has a persona stack installed!
LanguageData.AC.PawnAlreadyHasArchotechStack: {PAWN_nameDef} already has an archotech stack installed!
LanguageData.AC.PawnStackCannotDowngrade: {PAWN_nameDef} already has an archotech stack installed!
LanguageData.AC.CannotInstallStackNeckIsMissingOrAnot: Cannot install persona stack - neck is missing or another implant installed in the neck.
LanguageData.AC.EjectAllPersonaStacksDesc: Drop all contained persona stacks onto the ground.
LanguageData.AC.AllowAutomaticRestorationDesc: Toggle this button to allow/disallow automatic restoration.
LanguageData.AC.RestoringQueuedDesc: Stack of {PAWN_nameDef} has been destroyed. {PAWN_possessive} latest persona print backup has been queued to be restored.
LanguageData.AC.TakeToSleeveCasketOrMedicalBed: Take empty sleeve to sleeve casket or medical bed
LanguageData.AC.CannotTakeToSleeveCasketOrMedicalBed: Cannot take: No reachable, un-reserved sleeve casket or medical bed in safe temperature.
LanguageData.AC.CreateSleeveBodyDesc: Create a new baseliner or xenotype sleeve using available xenogerms.
LanguageData.AC.XenogermExplanation: Selected xenogerm will be consumed in the process. If no xenogerm is selected, the sleeve will be grown as a "Baseliner".
LanguageData.AC.GeneOptionsExplanation: Available options depend on the genes of the selected xenogerm. Chosen options will be used as active genes, while conflicting ones will be dormant.
LanguageData.AC.BodyOptionsExplanation: Baseliner skins and hair colour options are always available. Chosen options will be used as active genes, while conflicting ones will be dormant.
LanguageData.AC.ConvertGenesToGermline: Grow non-archotech genes in xenogerm as germline genes:
LanguageData.AC.PowerSleeveWillBeLostIn: Due to lack of power, the sleeve will be lost in {0}.
LanguageData.AC.FuelSleeveWillBeLostIn: Due to lack of neutroamine, the sleeve will be lost in {0}.
LanguageData.AC.FuelSleeveWillBeDeteriorated: Due to lack of neutroamine, the sleeve will begin to deteriorate in {0}
LanguageData.AC.FuelSleeveIsDeteriorating: Due to lack of neutroamine, the sleeve is deteriorating.
LanguageData.AC.BrainTemplateIsUsedCurrently: Brain template is active and cannot be removed or changed during sleeve growth process. Abort sleeve growth in order to remove/change brain template.
LanguageData.AC.SleeveCustomizationExplanation: When you press Accept, a sleeve will begin growing in this Sleeve incubator. During growth, it will require a constant power connection as well as neutroamine connection via neutro pipes. When the timer finishes, a Sleeve can be extracted and either used straight-away, or inserted into a Sleeve casket.
LanguageData.AC.NoHairAllowed: This race does not support hair!
LanguageData.AC.CloneSleeveDesc: Create a sleeve based on an existing pawn, including endogenes.
LanguageData.AC.IsRunningOutFuel: Sleeve incubator is running out neutroamine
LanguageData.AC.IsRunningOutPower: Sleeve incubator is running out power
LanguageData.AC.SleeveInIncubatorIsDead: Sleeve body in the incubator is dead
LanguageData.AC.RepurposeCorpseDesc: Repurpose a not fully rotten corpse and turn it into an empty sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.CancelRepurposingCorpseDesc: Cancel repurposing corpse into a empty sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.PersonaStackMustBeRemovedFirst: Persona stack must be removed first.
LanguageData.AC.CannotRepurposeCorspeWithoutHead: Cannot repurpose corpse with missing head.
LanguageData.AC.SleeveDesignCouldntBeFullyLoaded: Saved Sleeve Design could not be fully loaded. Missing required xenogerm!
LanguageData.AC.PawnBodyCouldntBeFullyCopied: A {PAWN_nameDef} body couldn't be copied fully. The following xenogenes were skipped: {1}
LanguageData.AC.EjectPersonaPrintTooltip: Eject this persona print from the matrix.
LanguageData.AC.EjectPersonaPrintConfirmation: Do you really want to eject {0}? It will be immediately ejected onto the ground nearby.
LanguageData.AC.ErasePersonaPrintConfirmation: Do you really want to erase {0}? It will be immediately destroyed.
LanguageData.AC.EjectAllPersonaPrintsDesc: Drop all contained persona prints onto the ground.
LanguageData.AC.SeparateGeneDesc: Select a genepack from which to separate a gene from.
LanguageData.AC.SelectGeneExplanation: The selected gene will be separated from the rest of the gene pack.
LanguageData.AC.SeparateGeneExplanation: After successful separation two genepacks will be spawned. One only with the selected gene, the other one with the rest. This process is not perfect and there is a small chance of one of the gene packs being destroyed.
LanguageData.AC.FinishedSeparatingDestroyedMessage: Gene centrifuge finished separating genepacks! {0} was destroyed during the process.
LanguageData.AC.DuplicateXenogermDesc: Select a xenogerm to duplicate. Xenogerms with archite genes require archite capsules to be loaded.
LanguageData.AC.NotEnoughArchiteCapsulesLoaded: Do you really want to duplicate the xenogerm? Not enough archite capsules are loaded to duplicate all any archite genes inside the xenogerm.
LanguageData.AC.OrganGrowingRecipesRequiresResearch: You need to research at least one organ growing recipe.
LanguageData.AC.InsertBrainTemplateDesc: Insert a brain template into the incubator.
LanguageData.AC.FactionDemandsStacks: {FACTION_name} demands stacks of their members back.\n\n{0}
LanguageData.AC.Name: Name
LanguageData.AC.HackStackDesc: Convert a stack to the players faction.
LanguageData.AC.ConvertStackDesc: Convert a stack to the players ideology.
LanguageData.AC.WipeStackDesc: Factory reset a filled persona to be used on a new host. This process will deleted the pawn stored on it, effectively killing them.
LanguageData.AC.NoConnectedMatrix: Cannot use: No Persona Matrix nearby.
LanguageData.AC.ConnectedMatrixHasNoPower: Cannot use: Connected Persona Matrix is not powered.
LanguageData.AC.WipingFriendlyStackWarning:
Warning: The stack you are trying to factory reset does not belong to your faction.
If you erase the content from a non-colonist stack from another faction, their entire faction may become your enemy.
LanguageData.AC.DuplicatingFriendlyStackWarning:
Warning: The stack you are trying to duplicate does not belong to your faction.
If you make a copy of the content from a non-colonist stack from another faction, their entire faction may become your enemy.
LanguageData.AC.EditingFriendlyStackWarning:
The stack you are trying to edit does not belong to your faction.
If you edit the content from a non-colonist stack from another faction, their entire faction may become your enemy.
LanguageData.AC.AlreadyOrderedToHackStack: This stack is set for hacking already on the persona editor. Remove the bill in order to add new operation on it.
LanguageData.AC.AlreadyOrderedToWipeStack: This stack is set for reseting already on a persona editor. Remove the bill in order to add new operation on it.
LanguageData.AC.AlreadyOrderedToEditStack: This stack is set for editing already on a persona editor. Remove the bill in order to add new operation on it.
LanguageData.AC.AlreadyOrderedToDuplicateStack: This stack is set for duplicating already on a persona editor. Remove the bill in order to add new operation on it.
LanguageData.AC.AlreadyOrderedToRestoreStack: This print is set for restoring already on a persona editor. Remove the bill in order to add new operation on it.
LanguageData.AC.FixedAncientStack: Decrypt Ancient Stacks: Fixed the ancient persona stack!
LanguageData.AC.UnlockedNewTechnology: Decrypt Ancient Stacks: Unlocked new technology - {0}!
LanguageData.AC.GainedProgressToTechnology: Decrypt Ancient Stacks: Gained progress to technology - {0}!
LanguageData.AC.GainedEmptyPersonaStack: Decrypt Ancient Stacks: Gained empty persona stack!
LanguageData.AC.HackingBiocodedSuccess: Hacking biocoded equipment: Successful! {0} is unlocked.
LanguageData.AC.EditStackDesc: Use exploits to edit the data stored on a filled persona stack.
LanguageData.AC.PersonaStackEditExplanation: Persona Stacks feature advanced encryption to prevent outside forces from messing with the stored consciousness. Known exploits allow for some data to be edited and rewritten at the cost of stack degradation.
LanguageData.AC.ChangingPawnIdeologyWarning: Changing a pawn ideology will also remove any roles assosiated from them.
LanguageData.AC.Tutorial: WARNING: The more you edit,the higher the stack degradation will be, causing the stored pawns personality to become more and more unstable. Stack degradation will go away over time after being installed in a body, but can take years.
LanguageData.AC.SuccessfullyRestoredStackFromBackup: {PAWN_nameDef} successfully restored persona stack from persona print.
LanguageData.AC.RestoreToStackAutomatically: Toggle if this person should be restored to a new stack automatically when the current stack is destroyed.
LanguageData.AC.EnableAutoRestoreDesc: Allow to automatically restore stacks from persona prints if a pawn with an installed persona stack dies.
LanguageData.AC.DuplicateStackDesc: Make a exact copy of an existing filled persona stack.
LanguageData.AC.AlreadySetToDuplicate: Already set a stack to duplicate
LanguageData.AC.AlreadySetToRestore: Already set a persona print to restore
LanguageData.AC.NoStackToDuplicate: There are no stacks to duplicate
LanguageData.AC.NoPersonaPrintToRestore: There are no persona prints to restore
LanguageData.AC.CancelStackDuplicationDesc: Cancel duplication of stored persona stack.
LanguageData.AC.CancelPersonaPrintRestorationDesc: Cancel stack restoration from persona print.
LanguageData.AC.EnableStackSpawningDesc: If disabled, Persona Stacks and Archostacks will NOT spawn on any pawns. You can still craft them, get them as rewards or trade for them.
LanguageData.AC.EnableTechprintRequirement: Enable techprint requirements in research projects
LanguageData.AC.TimeToGrowSleeveMultiplierDesc: Multiplicator of the overall time needed to grow a new sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.CostToGrowSleeveMultiplierDesc: Multiplicator of the overall neutroamine cost needed to grow a new sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.EnableStackDegradationDesc: If disabled, Persona Stacks can be edited to your heart's content without having to worry about stack degradation.
LanguageData.AC.StackEditEditTimeValueMultiplierDesc: Multiplicator of the overall stack editing time.
LanguageData.AC.StackEditDegradationValueMultiplierDe: Multiplies the overall stack degradation that is accumulated through editing.
LanguageData.AC.EnableArchostackEditingDesc: Allows you to edit the content of Archo Stacks.
LanguageData.AC.ColonistStackNeedsExtractingDesc:
These colonists are incapacitated on the ground:

{0}
Send another colonist to rescue them and carry them back to bed.

(To rescue, select another colonist, then right click on the victim and select Rescue.)
LanguageData.AC.SleeveDeathDoesNotCauseGearTainting: Sleeve death doesn't cause gear to be tainted
LanguageData.AC.EnableSoldPersonaPrintsCreatingPawnDu: Selling persona prints can create duplicates
LanguageData.AC.EnablePersonaPrintsInAncientDangers: Enable persona prints spawning in ancient dangers
LanguageData.AC.CannotInstallStackOnAndroidWithoutPer: Cannot install stacks into androids without a persona module.
LanguageData.AC.CannotInstallEmptyStackInEmptySleeve: Cannot install an empty stack into an empty sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.CannotInstallStackInBodyOfThisRace: Cannot install stacks into this race: {0}.
LanguageData.AC.CannotInstallFilledStackInChildren: Cannot install a filled stack into children.
LanguageData.AC.CannotInstallAlreadyHaveStack: Cannot install stack: Already has a stack installed.
LanguageData.AC.DetonateDesc: Trigger the installed cortex overseer to explode and kill the person it is installed in.
LanguageData.AC.TriggeredMentalFuseText: {PAWN_nameDef}'s mental fuse has triggered, preventing a mental break.
LanguageData.AC.MentalFuseTraumaText: {PAWN_nameDef}'s mental fuse has caused permanent damage in {PAWN_objective} brain. This damage has caused {PAWN_objective} to develop strange savant-like abilities.
LanguageData.AC.CreatingSkilltrainerCompleted: Creating skilltrainer completed for {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_nameDef}'s brain has been destroyed by the persona connector.
LanguageData.AC.ConfirmSkilltrainerPawn: Scanning {PAWN_nameDef} to create a skilltrainer will kill {PAWN_objective}. Are you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.AC.ConfirmCancelSkilltrainerPawn: Cancelling a skilltrainer process will still kill {PAWN_nameDef}. Are you sure you want to continue?
